channel.description: Recent content in data frame on inSileco

item.title: Creating empty data frames with dfTemplate() and dfTemplateMatch()
item.description: Creating a data frame is fairly simple but when you need to create a large empty data frame with columns that have different classes it takes several command lines. A few days ago, I decided to write a function to simplify this operation and I came to realize that such a function would actually be very useful to ease the row binding of data frames whose column names partially match.
